name: serverless-pact-example
description: Example testing a serverless app with Pact

scripts.test: npm run test:consumer && npm run test:publish && npm run test:provider
scripts.can-i-deploy: npm run can-i-deploy:consumer && npm run can-i-deploy:provider
scripts.can-i-deploy:consumer: $(find ../../ -name pact-broker | grep -e 'bin/pact-broker$' | head -n 1) can-i-deploy --pacticipant SNSPactEventConsumer --latest --broker-base-url https://test.pactflow.io --broker-username dXfltyFMgNOFZAxr8io9wJ37iUpY42M --broker-password O5AIZWxelWbLvqMd8PkAVycBJh2Psyg1
scripts.can-i-deploy:provider: $(find ../../ -name pact-broker | grep -e 'bin/pact-broker$' | head -n 1) can-i-deploy --pacticipant SNSPactEventProvider --latest --broker-base-url https://test.pactflow.io --broker-username dXfltyFMgNOFZAxr8io9wJ37iUpY42M --broker-password O5AIZWxelWbLvqMd8PkAVycBJh2Psyg1
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:consumer && npm run deploy:provider
scripts.deploy:consumer: npm run can-i-deploy && serverless deploy -f consumer
scripts.deploy:provider: npm run can-i-deploy && serverless deploy -f provider

author: Matt Fellows <matt.fellows@onegeek.com.au>
